snippet: Gridlock on Capitol Hill that could lead to a government shutdown is being backed by hard-right groups spending millions of dollars.
abstract: Editorial holds that the reason so many House Republicans seem intent on defunding health care reform by threatening a government shutdown or a default is because hard-right conservative groups are raising and spending millions with the promise to inflict political pain on any Republican official who does not go along; warns that the combination of unlimited money and rigid ideology is proving toxic for the most basic functioning of government.
lead_paragraph: Gridlock on Capitol Hill that could lead to a government shutdown is being backed by hard-right groups spending millions of dollars.
